A smart meeting analysis assistant based on Langflow, Groq, and OpenAI: meetingmind, which can analyze a one-hour meeting in 30 seconds and automatically generate meeting records and key information
Features:

2. Support audio recording and file upload, automatic transcription
3. Automatically extract key information, tasks, decisions, questions, insights, deadlines, participants, follow-up actions, risks, and agendas

子问题覆盖驱动的 RAG 系统优化
来自 @SFResearch 的论文提出了一个新颖的评估框架, 主要聚焦于 "子问题覆盖率" 这个维度来评估 RAG 系统, 主要内容：
- 将复杂问题分解为核心、背景和后续三类子问题

192c6fb5e9da181b.post_content_en:

Sub-problem coverage-driven RAG system optimization
A paper from @SFResearch proposed a novel evaluation framework, focusing on the dimension of "sub-problem coverage rate" to evaluate the RAG system, mainly including:
- Decomposing complex problems into three types of sub-problems: core, background, and subsequent
- Proposed a fine-grained evaluation protocol based on sub-problem coverage

1913b8985d0a921e.post_content_cn:
WalledEval - LLM 安全测试式化包
WalledEval 是一个中文计定的 AI 安全测试式化包。
式化包是趣中断。能多债到一些大小计中模式。
定不过一起测试开放权马的模式、以及通过 https://t.co/e4VRmnDYxa 连接的模式。
1913b8985d0a921e.post_content_en:
WalledEval - LLM Safety Evaluation Toolkit
WalledEval is a comprehensive AI safety testing toolkit designed to evaluate large language models (LLMs).
The toolkit is versatile, accommodating a wide range of models.
It can evaluate both open-weight models and those accessed via https://t.co/e4VRmnDYxa
1913b8985d0a921e.post_summary_cn: WalledEval 是一个安全测试式化包。定不过一起测试开放权马的模式、以及通过网页的模式。

The core idea of Handoff mode is to allow Agents to delegate tasks to other Agents, using special tool calls to achieve this, using AutoGen Core API to implement Handoff mode, giving play to AutoGen's extensibility, flexibility and ease of integration.

# Implementation idea:
- Multi-Agents collaboration

RouteLLM解决了大模型性能强价格贵，价格便宜但性能弱的问题，其能够在推理过程中动态选择更强或更弱的LLM，做到降低成本的同时不影响质量

功能：
1、替代OpenAI
190e1066baa11125.post_content_en:
A flexible and easy-to-use LLM routing framework: RouteLLM
RouteLLM solves the problem of high-performance models being expensive and low-performance models being cheap. It can dynamically select stronger or weaker LLMs during inference, reducing costs without affecting quality

Function:
1. Replace OpenAI

meng shao (@shao__meng) posted at 1:12 AM on Sat, Aug 03, 2024：
🗒txtai  @neumll  8.3k✨
txtai 是一个用于语义搜索、 LLM 编排和工作流的全能嵌入数据库 (embeddings db)
嵌入数据库是向量索引、图网络和关系数据库的结合体，这使得可以使用 SQL 进行向量搜索、主题建模、RAG 等。
它可以独立存在，或者作为 LLM prompts 的强大知识源。
🗒txtai 功能总结
191177442664eb60.post_content_en:
meng shao (@shao__meng) posted at 1:12 AM on Sat, Aug 03, 2024:
txtai is an all-in-one embedding database (embeddings db) for semantic search, LLM orchestration, and workflow.
The embedding database is a combination of vector index, graph network, and relational database, which enables vector search, topic modeling, RAG, etc. using SQL.
It can exist independently or as a powerful knowledge source for LLM prompts.
txtai feature summary
191177442664eb60.post_summary_cn: txtai 是一个用于语义搜索、 LLM 编排和工作流的全能嵌入数据库
191177442664eb60.post_summary_en: txtai is an all-in-one embedding database for semantic search, LLM orchestration, and workflow
